授業目的: Managing human resources is critical to the success of modern business organizations. The purpose of this course is to provide an overview of human resource management, especially from strategic and international perspectives. The topics covered in this class include job design, staffing, compensation, performance appraisal, training, labor relations, and global human resource practices.
到達目標: By completing this course, students should be able to understand the basic concepts in the major areas of human resource management and apply such knowledge to designing, conducting or improving human resource systems of the firm as managers or human resource specialists.
授業方法:
Hy-Flex.
The class format will be a combination of lectures, class discussions, and student presentations.
